evidence.claim: Med-Lab Imaging utilizes AWS S3 for cloud storage solutions.
The company maintains HIPAA compliance for handling patient data.
FHIR API is mentioned as part of their interoperability solutions.
HL7 standards are leveraged in their data exchange processes.
Integration via RESTful APIs is highlighted in their developer documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 transaction usage or EDI integration on the website.
